description: Number of directed trees with n nodes.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: P. Leroux and B. Miloudi, Généralisations de la formule d'Otter, Ann. Sci. Math. Quebec, 1992, Vol. 16, No. 1, 53-80.
Index entries for sequences related to trees
maple: with(combstruct):B:=x->add(3*count([S, {B = Set(S), S = Prod(B,B,B,Z)}, unlabeled],size=i)*x^i,i=1..50);seq(coeff(B(x)-B(x)^2/2+B(x^2)/2,x,n)/3,n=1..30);# with Algolib (Pab Ter)
author: _Simon Plouffe_
